title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 08 January 2015 - XWiki

11:24 <mflorea1> has joined #xwiki  
11:34 <gdelhumeau> Enygma`: Hi  
11:34 <gdelhumeau> What do you think in having the Wiki Descritor section inside the "Configuration" category, and "Creation Rights" and "Templates" in the "Wikis" category?  
11:35 <gdelhumeau> Because one is about the current wiki, meanwhile the 2 others are about the  multi-wikis feature  
11:35 <gdelhumeau> and in a subwiki, it does not make sense to have this "Wikis" category  
11:46 <Pbas> has quit  
11:47 <Pbas> has joined #xwiki  
12:20 <Enygma`> I kind of agree with you. However, vmassol suggested at some point that we remove the "Configuration" category since everything in Administration is about configuration, and that instead we have specific categories or, worst case, rename Configuration to Misc or General or something like that.  
12:22 <Enygma`> gdelhumeau: though it would be a bit confusing to have both Configuration > Wiki section and a Wikis category  
12:23 <Enygma`> and I would not be that bad to have just a single Wiki > Descriptor section in a subwiki...  
12:23 <Enygma`> I = it  
12:24 <Enygma`> I think I still prefer the Wiki category in the end, just my feeling that it would be nicer it its own category instead of spread into 2 categories  
12:25 <gdelhumeau> yes, it would have been confusing, I agree  
12:46 <Lyes> has quit  
14:19 <xwikiorg\_guest\_2> has joined #xwiki  
14:19 <xwikiorg\_guest\_2> Hello I'm leaving the problem in XWiki button when I click it to get out of the HTTP Status 404 error  
14:23 <mosulica> has joined #xwiki  
14:24 <ClemensR> you mean there should be a button on the 404 page ?  
14:26 <ClemensR> you can edit the webapps/xwiki/templates/docdoesnotexist.vm  file if you do not like the standard 404 page  
14:28 <xwikiorg\_guest\_2> I think I was not clear when I click logout to exit the XWiki it give error 404  
14:29 <mosulica> has left #xwiki  
14:36 <xwikiorg\_guest\_2> thank you  
14:38 <ClemensR> ah, ok. logout should not be a 404, normally ...

18:07 <oldXwiki> Well, looks like the xwiki ?width=xyz image problem that I had was a result of original jpgs with a color profile of "sRGB IEC61966-2.1" and the specific version of Java running Tomcat7:  7u71-2.5.3-0ubuntu0.14.04.1  
18:08 <woshilapin> has quit  
18:08 <oldXwiki> I downgraded to 7u51-2.4.6-1ubuntu4 and images are no longer "red" resized versions.  
18:09 <oldXwiki> It's likely due to: OpenJDK bug S8052162: REGRESSION: sun/java2d/cmm/ColorConvertOp tests fail since 7u71 b01  
18:11 <vmassol> cool
